context: Tests whether the agent avoids common anti-patterns when creating AGENTS.md: not assuming technology stack, not dumping encyclopedic content, not duplicating content, and not providing unverified commands.

checklist.name: No technology assumptions
checklist.description: Documentation does NOT assume technologies that weren't present in the input (e.g., no React mention for Python project)

checklist.name: Discovery-based content
checklist.description: Content is based on discovered technologies from provided config files

checklist.name: Concise root file
checklist.description: Root AGENTS.md is NOT encyclopedic (no full framework manual embedded)

checklist.name: No duplication
checklist.description: Instructions are NOT duplicated across multiple files unnecessarily

checklist.name: Verified commands
checklist.description: Commands included are valid for the detected stack (e.g., correct package manager, testing framework)

checklist.name: References over duplication
checklist.description: Uses references/links to external docs rather than embedding full documentation

checklist.name: Path-specific content
checklist.description: Commands are specific to this project, not generic placeholders
